channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Doing your holiday shopping with a credit card? Use these 6 tips to preserve your credit score — and your sanity.
item.description: Americans will be leaning hard on their credit cards this holiday season. A few key rules can keep you from slipping into a debt spiral.

item.title: Why trouble for the biggest foreign buyer of U.S. debt could ripple through America’s bond market
item.description: Developments in Japan are creating a risk that investors in the U.S. Treasury market may one day pull the rug out by keeping more of their savings at ...

item.title: The first-ever 3x levered bitcoin funds are launching in Europe next week. The timing couldn’t be worse.
item.description: Leveraged ETFs bring even more risk to volatile assets like crypto.

item.title: ‘We almost lost $10,000’: My late father-in-law’s company claimed his life-insurance policy didn’t exist. It did.
item.description: “The company changed names several times, and it was very difficult tracking them down for payment of benefits.”

item.title: ‘My retirement is completely in bitcoin’: Why don’t more people do what I do?
item.description: “‘I also borrow against bitcoin. What’s the catch?”

item.title: Watch bitcoin over weekend to see if stock market will bounce next week, says Katie Stockton
item.description: The key to the stock market rebounding next week may lie on how well bitcoin performs over the weekend, according to technical analyst Katie Stockton.

item.title: These are the chart levels to watch on Nvidia as chipmaker gets set to report earnings
item.description: What the Nvidia charts are showing, according to Frank Cappelleri of CappThesis.

item.title: Robinhood shares head for brutal weekly loss as bitcoin, AI stocks are hit hard
item.description: The platform's core business relies on retail investors pouring into speculative corners of the market, particularly crypto and AI-linked stocks.

item.title: Tech got crushed this week. This options trade generates income and can capture a rip back to record highs
item.description: Jeff Kilburg of KKM Financial breaks down this risk reversal options trade.

item.title: Two retail stocks to buy as the holiday shopping season kicks off next week
item.description: Loop Capital says Best Buy and Five Below will stand strong in a cloudy U.S. economy.
